positive.review: A Very good Idle game that does have longevity to it as the end game has legs.

Pretty good semi Idle game, lots of customizations with gear/builds/classes. A lot of content to play around with, like pets, building system, crafting and more. Would love a few QoL updates and better English translation.
I spent so much time on this game and still want to spend more
Great game
Good game
meh
meh

Gets real interesting 1k hours in, such a gem of a game.
Rare I leave reviews, but this one is worth it.  To me, the biggest downside, is the lack of info about certain aspects, you can make assumptions and some you can confirm via testing.

Not an idle game but with certain idle mechanics.
I think this is an excellent game for those who like RPGs, min/maxing gear (not just your group but sub teams), getting all the characters, running dungeons, etc..

Not for everyone, but I certainly enjoy it.
good idle game, i like it almost as much as the top 1 idle game on steam.  needs even more features and purchase dlc packs though.
A Very good Idle game that does have longevity to it as the end game has legs.

Pretty good semi Idle game, lots of customizations with gear/builds/classes. A lot of content to play around with, like pets, building system, crafting and more. Would love a few QoL updates and better English translation.

I'm not a fan of idle games, but this one is super fun. It has the perfect ratio of auto-combat elements (when you need to grind easy stages) and manual combat (for harder boss fights or clearing new stages). There is a lot of content from what I can see. The premise of the game is also pretty interesting and reminds me a lot of those xianxia novels I used to read. The only critique I have is the character art. And no, it's not because it's AI, it's because it is unrefined AI. I don't want to tell the developers what to do with their game, but if they used "face detailer" and an "upscaler" when creating new art it would look much better without any extra effort. The other thing I would want to see very much is the ability to add my own art to the game and swap the existing character sprites. Aside from that, the game is very addictive and I totally recommend getting it.

The Game makes a bit addicted its really fun but i would like if they add a lot DLC's, also i hope that we might get also some sort of mode which does have no afk mode just to have some difference and more fun playing, i really enjoy the game.. hoffe update kommt bald
I spent so much time on this game and still want to spend more
a week in and I still don't know whats happening

negative.review:
[h1]NETWORK MANIPULATION WARNING[/h1]

The game itself is a neat idle game, I don't even mind the poor translation, but it is absolutely running some background process that is untoward. Not only does it take up an alarming amount of CPU/RAM processing--which I initially chalked up to poor coding, not uncommon in idle games--but when I went to log into World of Warcraft while it was running, it loaded Taiwanese servers and wouldn't let me switch. Closing the game/uninstalling did not change this after re-loading, but restarting my PC (and thus my network) let me log back into the NA servers. 

Something in this game, I can conclude, changes your network routing. For what purpose I'm not sure. But I was reminded of another review that said something about bitcoin mining. I can't confirm one way or another, but I'm running every scan and precaution I can now. If you've played this game I suggest you do the same.
The game has a lot of bugs, and unless you speak Chinese, no Dev will ever hear you.
Love the game! Hate the translation don't understand how some things work at all! but keep playing and trying, will change to positive when I figure out what is what!
Bad translations,  and seems to run high for a idle game

I can't confirm one way or another, but I'm running every scan and precaution I can now. If you've played this game I suggest you do the same.
The game has a lot of bugs, and unless you speak Chinese, no Dev will ever hear you.
Love the game! Hate the translation don't understand how some things work at all! but keep playing and trying, will change to positive when I figure out what is what!
Bad translations,  and seems to run high for a idle game

[h1]NETWORK MANIPULATION WARNING[/h1]

The game itself is a neat idle game, I don't even mind the poor translation, but it is absolutely running some background process that is untoward. Not only does it take up an alarming amount of CPU/RAM processing--which I initially chalked up to poor coding, not uncommon in idle games--but when I went to log into World of Warcraft while it was running, it loaded Taiwanese servers and wouldn't let me switch. Closing the game/uninstalling did not change this after re-loading, but restarting my PC (and thus my network) let me log back into the NA servers. 

Something in this game, I can conclude, changes your network routing. For what purpose I'm not sure. But I was reminded of another review that said something about bitcoin mining. I can't confirm one way or another, but I'm running every scan and precaution I can now. If you've played this game I suggest you do the same.
The game has a lot of bugs, and unless you speak Chinese, no Dev will ever hear you.
